title: Enhancing Medical Practice Competencies: Model-Free Q-Learning Practice for H∞ Tracking Control Design

context.prior_knowledge: Linear control theory, discrete-time systems, optimization-based controller design, and introductory machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Quantify the mathematical modeling and performance of H∞ tracking control problems
Explain the relationship between the Game Algebraic Riccati Equation (GARE) and Q-learning algorithms
Design a controller for discontinuous systems using model-free Q-learning and verify it through simulation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
